t: The Storymatic: A Review - Nathan B. Weller
s: October 10, 2023 - The Storymatic Classic is the flagship product of Storymatic Studios. It provides those using it with "six trillion stories in one little box." An impressive feat! But one only possible with the help of a willing storyteller to use it.

t: The Storymatic Kids, Board Games - Amazon Canada
s: Six gazillion stories in one little box. Which one will you tell? No wires. No screens. No batteries. Just pick a few of the cards and watch a story take shape before your eyes. How you tell it is up to you. Write it, draw it, act it, sing it! Card content is appropriate for children.
